epd_metadata.declaration_owner: Holcim México Operaciones, S.A. de C.V.

product_description.company_description: Holcim México Operaciones SA de CV produces and markets cement, ready-mix concrete, and other products and services for construction.
product_description.study_goal: The intended application of this life cycle assessment (LCA) is to comply with the procedures for creating a Type III environmental product declaration (EPD) and publish the EPD for public review.
product_description.description_of_product_and_scope: This EPD is primary reported Holcim data from the reference year 2020 and uses direct reported Holcim information whenever possible. This LCA is a cradle-to-gate study.

lca_information.data_sources_and_quality: Primary data from Holcim México Operaciones, S.A. de C.V. and ecoinvent v3.6 database.

transport_and_installation.transport_requirements: Transportation of A1 materials from the supplier to the manufacturing facility.

carbon_emission_context.global_warming_potential: GWP is calculated using the IPCC method and expressed in kg CO2 equivalent.

recycled_materials_handling.recycled_content: Fly Ash and other additives are used in some mixes.
recycled_materials_handling.material_losses: Assumed material losses are 0.02 for most materials.

additional_info.additional_environmental_info: No regulated substances of very high concern are utilized on site.
